title: Enhancing Customer Service Competencies: Explanatory Writing on Respiratory Systems—Guided Inquiry vs. Problem-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Prior knowledge of the basic structure and function of the respiratory system, foundational scientific writing skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the differences between GIL and PBL approaches in scientific writing explaining respiratory system structures and functions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explore respiratory disorder cases through VR simulations and present three or more scientific justifications in explanatory writing.
Learners can evaluate the logical consistency of GIL-based and PBL-based writing outputs using a 4-level rubric through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
